name: 葉采青
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
week 　　 
1　　Orientation / How much do you know…(p.6) / Unit 1 Warm up
2　　U1L1 Make generalizations 
3　　U1L2 Write an informal Email
4　　U1L3 Retell a simple narrative / U1L4 Wrap up 
5　　Unit 2 Warm up / U2L1 Giving opinions and agree/disagree
6　　U2L2 Deal with problems
7　　U2L3 Describe an important event / U2L4 Wrap up
8　　Unit 3 Warm up  / U3L1 Write a letter of complaint
9　　U3L2 Compare Cities  / Campus-wide English Proficiency Test 
10　　U3L3 Make a formal phone call / U3L4 Wrap up
11　　Unit 4 Warm up / U4L1 Make small talk
12　　U4L2 Make and respond to invitations
13　　U4L3 Write a short classified ad / U4L4 Wrap up 
14　　Unit 5 Warm up / U5L1 Suggest and respond to ideas
15　　U5L2 Describe a movie or book
16　　U5L3 Recommend a restaurant 
17　　U5L4 Wrap up  / Review
18　　Final Examination / Campus-wide English Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
B.各班正規課程成績 = 出席*10%+平時成績*30%+期中考試*30%+期末考試*30%
C.期中會考測驗成績
D.期末會考測驗成績
E.學期總成績= B*70%+C*15%+ D*15%
